Text:
Damn, leave some comments guys. Let me know even if you like it and/or you have any problems with it.

-cerealkilla-
If you guys have trouble downloading from here you can go to this site and register. You should get much better speeds here http://www.blackcats-games.net/?__cmd=torrent.details&id=1133770203
I just downloaded this cerealkilla, thanks for making it.  I haven't tried it yet, but I'm seeding it, so others shouldn't have too much of a problem getting it.

NOTE that all format options will format F and G drives. So if you have any apps, games, movies, etc on F or G they will be lost. In the next release I will make it so that formatting F and G is optional. That way you don't lose 100gigs worth of games and stuff on F just to upgrade your softmod.
